tst.views.ab_input(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display attendance input page.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a attendance input page where user can input attendance which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.
